Testimonials.title: Loved by developers worldwide
Testimonials.description: Join thousands of students who have transformed their careers through our courses and mentorship.

item0.name: Sarah Chen
item0.content: Tony's courses bridged the gap between theory and practice for me. I went from struggling with React to leading frontend projects in 3 months.

item1.name: Michael Rodriguez
item1.content: The best investment I made for my career. The project-based approach is exactly what I needed to build a portfolio that employers actually care about.

item2.name: Emily Watson
item2.content: I love how Tony explains complex concepts simply. The community support is also incredible - you never feel like you're learning alone.

item3.name: David Kim
item3.content: Even as an experienced dev, I found the advanced Next.js patterns incredibly valuable. Highly recommended for anyone wanting to master modern web dev.

item4.name: Lisa Patel
item4.content: From zero to first client in 6 months. The business side of coding that Tony teaches is a game changer that most courses ignore.

item5.name: James Wilson
item5.content: I was stuck in a dead-end job. Coding with Tony gave me the skills and confidence to pivot into tech. Forever grateful!

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the course and billing.

item0.question: Is this course suitable for complete beginners?
item0.answer: Yes! We have a dedicated path for beginners that starts from the absolute basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript before moving to React and Next.js. No prior experience is required.

item1.question: How long do I have access to the materials?
item1.answer: You have lifetime access to all course materials, including future updates. You can learn at your own pace and revisit lessons whenever you'd like.

item2.question: Do you offer mentorship or code reviews?
item2.answer: Absolutely. Our Pro plan includes weekly group coaching calls and priority code reviews to ensure you're on the right track and following best practices.

item3.question: What projects will I build?
item3.answer: You will build 4 production-ready projects: a personal portfolio, a blog with CMS integration, an e-commerce dashboard, and a full-stack SaaS application.

item4.question: Can I get a refund if I am not satisfied?
item4.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you feel the course isn't right for you, just reach out to our support team for a full refund, no questions asked.
